attributes.action: Scrap the NMC nursing registration fee.
attributes.additional_details: Some nurses like myself are not entitled to sick pay and are worried about the financial cost of getting the virus and having to stay home. I realise the government have introduced help in this instance, however it still feels wrong and immoral to charge nurses a fee to do their job in this current climate.
attributes.background: It is unfair to expect nurses to pay £120 to register when they are putting their lives at risk still going to work. We cannot stay home and protect ourselves and our families.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307399

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
